sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
    SignUpContainer,
    Form,
    Title,
    Input,
    Button,
    OverlayContainer,
    Overlay,
    LeftOverlayPanel,
    RightOverlayPanel,
    Paragraph,
} from '../Styles';

function SignUpPage({ toggle }) {
    return (
        <SignUpContainer>
            <Form>
                <Title>Create Account</Title>
                <Input type='text' placeholder='Name' />
                <Input type='email' placeholder='Email' />
                <Input type='password' placeholder='Password' />
                <Button onClick={toggle}>Sign Up</Button>
            </Form>
            <OverlayContainer>
                <Overlay>
                    <LeftOverlayPanel>
                        <Title>Welcome Back!</Title>
                        <Paragraph>To keep connected with us please login with your personal info</Paragraph>
                        <Button onClick={toggle}>Sign In</Button>
                    </LeftOverlayPanel>
                    <RightOverlayPanel>
                        <Title>Hello, Friend!</Title>
                        <Paragraph>Enter Your personal details and start journey with us</Paragraph>
                        <Button onClick={toggle}>Sign Up</Button>
                    </RightOverlayPanel>
                </Overlay>
            </OverlayContainer>
        </SignUpContainer>
    );
}

export default SignUpPage;
